MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG1 and DG12 postcode areas of Dumfries and Annan. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.55am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required to help locate the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:31PM on Sunday 24 January 2021.
